Package oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits

Class PassageObject

java.lang.Object
oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits.AbstractObject
oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits.EditModelObject
oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits.PassageObject
public class PassageObject
extends EditModelObject
ok so basically this represents an EditablePassage object but it's an GUI form instead. bottom text

    • move

      public void move​(Vector2D moveVector)
      Moves this object by the specified amount of movement. Updates the position of this object, updates the position of the passage, updates this passage's links, tells the model to update all the links of other passageObjects that link to this object, and updates the areaRectangle of this passage (so it can still be clicked and such)
      Overrides:
      move in class AbstractObject
      Parameters:
      moveVector - the vector2D representing the movement that needs to be done by this object

    • updatePositionOfSpecificLink

      public void updatePositionOfSpecificLink​(java.util.UUID updateThisOne)
      Update the position of a specific passageLinkObject
      Parameters:
      updateThisOne - the UUID of the link that needs updating

    • updateLinkedObjectPositions

      public void updateLinkedObjectPositions()
      Call this after all the passageObjects have been moved. This will ensure that all of the child passageLinkObjects belonging to this object will be moved.

    • yeetLinkToYotePassage

      public void yeetLinkToYotePassage​(java.util.UUID yeetThis)
      Remove the passageLinkObject that points to the (now deleted) passage with the specified UUID from this passageObject's linkMap
      Parameters:
      yeetThis - the UUID that the link to yeet points to
